creditline: Gift from the Helen D. Ling Collection in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Art
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: boy at left wearing a green tunic, lavender pants and red shoes pulling a dragon-shaped sled with three dolls, including a warrior doll with a sword, and a large red flag at back of sled; child wearing red tunic, yellow pants and blue shoes, playing a drum, at far left; three other children at right behind sled--one playing a drum, one playing cymbals, one playing a horn; tree with drooping thin branches at right; one horizontal line of text in black in ULC with two square red seals
title: Children playing at a make-believe parade
